price: E quem se volta arrependido e faz o bem, por certo, ele se volta para Allah, arrependido, perfeitamente.
arabic: وَمَن تَابَ وَعَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا فَإِنَّهُۥ يَتُوبُ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ مَتَابٗا

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: waman tāba waʿamila ṣāliḥan fa-innahu yatūbu ilā al-lahi matāban
